bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--Directory Services--Application Programming Interface (API) [Language Independent]
IEEE Standard for Information Technology--Directory Services--Application Programming Interface (API) [Language Independent]

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Withdrawn Standard. A application program interface (API) to OSI directory services is defined in terms that are independent of any particular programming language. The interface, which supports applications portability at the source-code level, is intended to be used by both applications developers and directory service implementors.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
